full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,LHA MO DUNG SKYONG MA LA MCHOD GTOR 'BUL TSUL BSKANG BSHAGS SOGS BYA BA'I CHO GA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @007A *, ,(CES 'DOD KHAMS DBANG MO LHA MO DUNG SKYONG MA'I BSKANG BSHAGS SOGS MCHOD GTOR 'BUL TSUL 'DI YANG, SLOB DPON PADMAS GTER GZHUNG KHUNGS MA MDZAD PA YOD PA DE LA GZHI BYAS TE BSTAN 'DZIN MKHAS GRUB YE SHES KYIS BSGRIGS PA LA'ANG KHA BSKONG SBYAR TE BRIS PA'I DGE BAS RMONG SRID 'DOD SKYE BO RNAMS JI LTAR 'DOD PA BZHIN BU DANG TSA BO MYUR DU THOB CING YOD PA RNAMS KYANG TSE RING NAD MED RING DU 'TSO BAR DGE LEGS 'PHEL, ,MANGGA LAm, ,DGE BA'O, ,)
